metadata.title: 100 Legendary Poker Hands Database
metadata.description: Comprehensive collection of 100 legendary poker hands across 10 categories for testing, study, and simulation

hands.name: Quads vs Royal Flush
hands.description: Pocket Kings make quads, lose to royal flush on river
hands.study_value: Tests river equity flips and pot awards

hands.name: AA vs 72o Preflop
hands.description: Aces cracked by worst hand preflop all-in
hands.study_value: Preflop all-in variance simulation

hands.name: Set vs Runner-Runner
hands.description: Flopped set loses to runner-runner straight
hands.study_value: Multi-street betting with runner-runner

hands.name: KK vs A2
hands.description: Kings lose to ace-deuce on ace-high board
hands.study_value: Ace-high board dynamics

hands.name: QQ vs J9
hands.description: Queens lose to jack-nine on flush draw
hands.study_value: Flush draw completion

hands.name: AK vs 72
hands.description: Ace-king loses to seven-deuce on straight
hands.study_value: Straight completion

hands.name: JJ vs T9
hands.description: Jacks lose to ten-nine on straight
hands.study_value: Broadway straight

hands.name: TT vs 98
hands.description: Tens lose to nine-eight on flush
hands.study_value: Flush over pair

hands.name: 99 vs 87
hands.description: Nines lose to eight-seven on straight
hands.study_value: Wheel straight

hands.name: 88 vs 76
hands.description: Eights lose to seven-six on straight
hands.study_value: Wheel straight
